name: Lost in the Forest
description: Join the adventures of a little boy that is lost in the forest. You must avoid all the forest creatures, like the fox, the frog, the hedgehog and many others (even a shark). Travel through many locations and try to find your way back.
minimum_requirements: OS: xp,7,8,8.1 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: any with direct X DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2 Ghz core 2 duo Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: any with direct x DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: any
